Computer.name: F-Stop Production Server
Computer.file:
#4492 - Repulsion Paint Project goal: To create a coating that will bounce any and all substances that touch it
Project notes: Too bouncy to handle

#4521 - Break-fall Pantaloons Project goal: To create an article of clothing that will break any fall from a distance of up to 5 metres
Project notes: Too old-fashioned. May want to invest in designing Break-fall Pants

#4582 - Trans-spatial Quantum Wormhole Apparatus Project goal: Basically a device that makes wormholes to travel from one place to another
Project notes: This thing will destroy the world. Best not to produce it.
Computer.encryptedFile:
[CLASSIFIED] - ICaRUS (Intelligent Computing and Rootkit Upload System) Project goal: Artificial Intelligence
Project notes: Nearing completion.
Collaborators: Franklin Castle - Design Sam Valeska - Audio Design Danton Enterprises - Programming and Design D Corp - Finance
